channel.title: [637/639] Making npc's attack all players
channel.description: I have trouble with npc's in combat with multiple players in my server. The npc's will only attack one person, and won't switch between players. If there's 3 players fighting bandos for example, and player 1 walks into the room first, the minions and bandos all attack player 1. And they don't ever change and try attacking players 2/3 Ideas on how to fix this are greatly appreciated - thank you all in advance!
